name: tasktail
description: TaskTail is a powerful VS Code extension that helps developers manage tasks directly within their IDE. Create, track, and receive timely notifications for tasks, ensuring you stay productive and organized. With features like integrated task management and cross-device notifications, TaskTail keeps your workflow efficient and your deadlines in check.

scripts.package: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
